text: Douglas Keith Scott (29 May 1941 â€“ 7 December 2020) was an English mountaineer. He was born in Nottingham, Nottinghamshire. He was known for being on the team that made the first ascent of the south-west face of Mount Everest on 24 September 1975.Piolet d'Or In early 2020, Scott was diagnosed with brain cancer and lymphoma. He died on 7 December 2020 from the diseases, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British mountain climbers Category:English writers Category:People from Nottingham
title: Doug Scott
